subject: Re: Is this group defunct?
msgSnippet: I would third Nathan s request, but it might be better to share the letters in a more permanent location, like the Internet Archive, and share the link here.
messageBody:
I would third Nathan's request, but it might be better to share the letters in a more permanent location, like the Internet Archive, and share the link here. Who knows how much longer Yahoo Groups will continue to exist?

In other news, check this out:

https://articles.c-a-s-t.com/towards-an-ideal-alphabet-the-origins-and-the-typographic-interpretation-of-shavian-22bb5455c11c
